column5: Anyone heard about the Petawawa Sportsman Show?  I went on their web site and it looks pretty good.  Anyone been to it before? www.petawawashow.com
give me an S    what are we fishing for
was there last year it sucked!!!
I thought someone would  give me a "P" followed by a,...aaah never mind  must be too far in history
I,ll give you a P and raise you  L A K E.
I'll give you an 'S' and introduce you to Petawawa Sportsman Show and their smart looking banner on our board.

Banner or not, I consider the OP to be spam. How about an introduction, and lead in to the promotion on the board. A blatant plug for their product, (Petawawa Sportsman Show), posed as a question to the board is in poor taste IMHO. Remember my opinions may not neccessarily be the same as others' (yours) opinions. I recall a thread not too long ago that a bunch of tighty whities got bunched up as well. I hope this does not turn into that type of thread.
Nah, Just a newbie looking to be welcomed here.  Ever hear of a Goby?  I made another post here about a strange fish I once caught.  You guys figured it out from my description right away!!!
You did good Albert. We'll try to change this silliness that we call a business/community plan to fit into your daily moods. Thanks for being so vigilant.
